title: rioter we need the response about those RP
body:
we need the response when those riot point will add to our account, if u can't add to our account pls notice why
and whoever has the same problem pls came

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to have them check out the situation and add the RP to your account manually.

Please note, support is currently backlogged and requests could take up to 48 hours (Or longer) for an initial response.
Yeah I brought 2 $10 cards I should have 2200 RP to my name but nothing yet and its pissing me off

Yeah i have spent $75 on 2 cards XD

Me wants me Riots Points Dag Nabbit
